analysis.description:
RBAC.roles (/unique_chucks/34/0x247260ff376fe54807bbd6e6361afa8918a61479.sol#186-187) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- checkRole (/unique_chucks/34/0x247260ff376fe54807bbd6e6361afa8918a61479.sol#201-205)
	- hasRole (/unique_chucks/34/0x247260ff376fe54807bbd6e6361afa8918a61479.sol#214-220)
	- addRole (/unique_chucks/34/0x247260ff376fe54807bbd6e6361afa8918a61479.sol#226-232)
	- removeRole (/unique_chucks/34/0x247260ff376fe54807bbd6e6361afa8918a61479.sol#237-247)

IncentivePoolContract.getIncentiveNumByTime (/unique_chucks/34/0x247260ff376fe54807bbd6e6361afa8918a61479.sol#343-365) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- tempYear == 0
	- tempYear == 1
	- tempYear == 2
Ownable.renounceOwnership (/unique_chucks/34/0x247260ff376fe54807bbd6e6361afa8918a61479.sol#93-97) should be declared external
Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/34/0x247260ff376fe54807bbd6e6361afa8918a61479.sol#101-106) should be declared external
RBAC.hasRole (/unique_chucks/34/0x247260ff376fe54807bbd6e6361afa8918a61479.sol#214-220) should be declared external
